name: A BIT OF HOPE (DEMO)
description:
--A BIT OF HOPE--

A BIT OF HOPE is an in-development project created by me.

If you like the game idea and want to support further development, consider donating!

--THE MAIN STORYLINE--

You are an evolved robot trapped in a facility.

Can you escape it?

Let's see your skills.

--HOW TO PLAY--

WASD or Arrow Keys to move, click to shot.
